DOC.brief_summary: To assess effectiveness latanoprost 0.005 % ophthalmic solution dose once-daily timolol 0.5 % dose twice-daily paediatric subject 18 year age diagnose glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Prospective , Randomized , Double-Masked , 12-Week , Parallel Group Study In Pediatric Subjects With Glaucoma .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year age Diagnosis glaucoma IOP 22 mmHg least 1 eye Require surgery acute angle closure Have prior cyclodestructive procedure Have history ocular trauma surgery either eye within 3 month baseline visit
